content: yarn wrap strands 1 down from tied end tie securely and thread tails down into head of tassel trim ends of tassel evenly attach tassel to top center of hat and fasten securely trim with a 24 length of cc whipstitch all around lower edge of hat rib as shown in photo weave in tails copyright 2017 2008 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 2
